price: Ohunkóhun tí wọ́n bá ń fẹ́ wà fún wọn ní ọ̀dọ̀ Olúwa wọn. Ìyẹn sì ni ẹ̀san àwọn ẹni rere
arabic: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡۚ ذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: lahum mā yashāūna ʿinda rabbihim dhālika jazāu al-muḥ'sinīna
